      • evaluateClassification

        public void evaluateClassification()

      • computeAccuracy

        public double computeAccuracy()
        Description copied from interface: EvaluatorInterface
        Compute the accuracy of the predicted result. It will compare the predicted result with the real document label. The accuracy is the number of true positive documents plus the number of true negative documents divided by all documents that predicted.
        Specified by:
        computeAccuracy in interface EvaluatorInterface
        Returns:
        accuracy

      • computePrecision

        public double computePrecision()
        Description copied from interface: EvaluatorInterface
        Compute the precision of the predicted result. It will compare the predicted result with the real document label. The precision is the number of true positive documents divide by the number of true positive documents plus number of false positive documents
        Specified by:
        computePrecision in interface EvaluatorInterface
        Returns:
        precision

      • computeRecall

        public double computeRecall()
        Description copied from interface: EvaluatorInterface
        Compute the recall of the predicted result. It will compare the predicted result with the real document label. The recall is the number of true positive documents divided by all positive documents that predicted
        Specified by:
        computeRecall in interface EvaluatorInterface
        Returns:
        recall

      • computeFMeasure

        public double computeFMeasure()
        Description copied from interface: EvaluatorInterface
        Compute the fMeasure of the predicted result. It will compare the predicted result with the real document label. The fMeasure is the denote the relationship between precision and recall. Here we consider the a parameter to be 0.5, which means assign equal weight to precision and recall.
        Specified by:
        computeFMeasure in interface EvaluatorInterface
        Returns:
        fMeasure
